Road Network-Class C Roads.Note: “C” Class – Other roads such as agricultural roads and local roads (Single carriage way of 12ft. width and a platform width of 22ft. mostly metalled but with a small percentage gravelled).

Road Network-Class D Roads.Note: “D” Class – Gravelled road with 8ft. – 10ft. width surface generally motorable during dry weather only.

Road Network-Class E Roads.Note: “E” Class – Briddle paths, generally unmotorable but some are jeepable.

SLTB-Regional Bus Companies-Buses Operat.Note: Buses under SLTTS (Sri Lanka Tourist Transport Service), are included in Western Province from 2014 onwards.

SLTB-Regional Bus Companies-Operated Kil.Note: Buses under SLTTS (Sri Lanka Tourist Transport Service), are included in Western Province from 2014 onwards.

SLTB-Regional Bus Companies-Passenger Ki.Note: (1). Buses under SLTTS (Sri Lanka Tourist Transport Service), are included in Western Province from 2014 onwards. (2).Data from 2009 has been revised due to a change in the data source from National Transport Commission to Sri Lanka Transport Board.
